languages.text: {n}Взглянув в свои плитки и просияв, Джай решительно заявляет:{/n} "Я буду вскрываться, Великий сегодня меня любит".
{n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."
languages.original_text: {n}Взглянув в свои плитки и просияв, Джай решительно заявляет:{/n} "Я буду вскрываться, Великий сегодня меня любит".

{n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."
{n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

languages.text: {n}婕伊看了一眼自己的牌，充满自信地宣布道。{/n}“我要开牌了，至高无上的神皇今天待我真是不薄。”
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊看了一眼自己的牌，充满自信地宣布道。{/n}“我要开牌了，至高无上的神皇今天待我真是不薄。”

languages.text: {n}手札をちらりと見てニヤリと笑ったジェイは、決然としてこう宣言する。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワン、今日も私を愛してくださるみたいだね」
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

traits.locale_text: {n}手札をちらりと見てニヤリと笑ったジェイは、決然としてこう宣言する。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワン、今日も私を愛してくださるみたいだね」

languages.text: {n}Mirando sus fichas y sonriendo, Jae declara, decidida:{/n} «Voy a mostrar mi mano. Hoy tengo el favor del Exaltado».
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirando sus fichas y sonriendo, Jae declara, decidida:{/n} «Voy a mostrar mi mano. Hoy tengo el favor del Exaltado».

languages.text: {n}Jae jette un coup d'œil à ses tuiles puis affiche un grand sourire et annonce avec enthousiasme :{/n} « Je vais poser ma main. L'Exalté me porte dans Son cœur, aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae jette un coup d'œil à ses tuiles puis affiche un grand sourire et annonce avec enthousiasme :{/n} « Je vais poser ma main. L'Exalté me porte dans Son cœur, aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: {n}Nach einem Blick auf deine Steine grinst Jae und erklärt entschlossen:{/n} "Ich werde meine Hand offenlegen. Der Erhabene liebt mich heute."
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem Blick auf deine Steine grinst Jae und erklärt entschlossen:{/n} "Ich werde meine Hand offenlegen. Der Erhabene liebt mich heute."

languages.text: {n}Karolarına bakıp gülümseyen Jae, kararlı bir şekilde deklare ediyor.{/n} "Elimi açıyorum. Görkemli bugün benim yanımda."
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at her tiles and grinning, Jae declares resolutely,{/n} "I'm going to show my hand. The Exalted One loves me today."
